website_summaries.verdict: For fans of electric appliances, this is a solid bet, but the dipping method of making crepes can seem challenging at first.
pros: Easy to use with nearly foolproof results
Provides a good show for guests
cons: Can be messy when dipping pan into crepe batter
Cannot control temperature, so it’s difficult to make slightly crispy crepes

customer_reviews.title: Works well if you have the right information
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, but there are things you need to know that are not in the book. First of all, you really need to separate the finished crepe with wax paper or they stick together. Secondly, the crepes will be VERY thin unless you hold the crepe maker in the batter for at least 10 seconds. Still, it works MUCH better than the crepe pan I bought. It makes crepe much easier and they are more uniform. This is important if you want to make a crepe cake.
customer_reviews.author: Corbett B. Coburn III

customer_reviews.title: Such a great product
customer_reviews.text: I won’t lie, I was a little suspicious even after reading all of the great reviews. This is such a great product, easy to use and very convenient. I bought this for my mother, after she had a stroke. I make the crepes for her and then she fills them as she wishes. I love the fact that it shuts off at the perfect cooking level, it makes the process very easy. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Mangorita

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: love it! easy to clean and use. for a basic crepe recipe combine on a blender 1 cup of milk, 1cup of flour and 2 eggs. Add desired salt, sugar or vanilla for sweet or savory crepes.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the easiest crepe maker made. For all of us who do not possess the wrist agility to pour crepe batter in a hot pan and get the batter to perfectly cover this crepe maker is your answer. We are having fruit filled crepes due to summer's bounty. I haven't tried savory crepes yet, but I think I will try chicken pot pie filling. No pie crust, less calories & fuss. Sure to get years of good crepes with this crepe maker.
customer_reviews.author: Gail M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was quick and it did what its supposed to. I gave it one star in the category for 'giftable' as it came without a product box (which was stated in the description) but the instructions manual obviously had water damage and was all stuck together and just ripped and fell apart upon trying to read them. So no instructions. I had a friend that has one luckily, so I knew how to use it. And I'm sure you could find the instructions online if you needed to. But does make it something you wouldnt 'gift' to someone. Other than that, I love it. Super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Angelbaby102981

customer_reviews.title: Cray-Cray
customer_reviews.text: This little invention was CRAZY!! My daughter saved up and bought it after she had seen a "video" online about it she used her own money and I was COMPLETELY prepared on my SOAP box...see you can't believe everything you see on TV!! WHEN IT WORKED!! Super cool, fun, easy, clean easy little kitchen tool!! LOVE IT!! If it breaks I would even buy it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald J Fetters JR

customer_reviews.title: Really Loved It
customer_reviews.text: It is not that I could not make a good crepe without it. It is just that despite the fact I have made crepes for a dozen years, the results are hit and miss. Some are small and thin just like they are supposed to be, others look like a pancake on crack. This little beauty, on the other hand, produces crepe after crepe perfectly. I can produce 10 crepes in 20 minutes. It saves a lot of time and your results are consistent. Wish I could solve my other problems in life as easily.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a year and absolutely love it. It is so easy to setup and use. Makes perfect thin crepes. Hardly any cleaning required. I also use a Braun immersion blender to mix the ingredients. I make around 12 crepes for my family every other Sunday. Suggest Stonewall Crepe Mix also available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: K. Krishnan

customer_reviews.title: Fun item
customer_reviews.text: I got this product as a recommendation from my sister in law. Not a necessity but I like kitchen gadgets. It took some getting used to but I was able to make quite a few crepes in a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: moving to Paris to open a crepe stand
customer_reviews.text: Well that may be a stretch but this is one handy little crepe maker. takes about three dips to get the hang of it and then perfect crepes every time. Throw the little leveler away, you will not need it. Also makes flour tortillas but haven't tried that yet. Still enjoying crepes!
customer_reviews.author: R. Putman

customer_reviews.title: Genius invention
customer_reviews.text: Genius invention!!! This crepe maker is absolutely amazing. Now I can make crepes with absolutely no mess, and no stress. My kids love eating crepes, but it would be such a hassle to make them before. Now with this, I Want to make them! Soo easy to use, and make perfect crepes every time.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg

customer_reviews.title: Temperature is automatic
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little kitchen addition. I make basic crepe batter and then season it depending on my filling. I make enough crepes to last a couple of days. Great for a quick snack with jam spread. Easy to use and clean. No guesses about pan temperature. It’s all automatic.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Reid

customer_reviews.title: Easiest way to make crepes! Hands down!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best kitchen gadget ever! I had only made crepes once before in my life and never did again bc of how hard it was to get them the right thickness and flipping them was a nightmare. This here! Omg i was able to make 20+ crepes easy like a pro! My teenagers can even make crepes!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Not manufactured correct / cooks really fast
customer_reviews.text: When I first unpackaged this I thought it wasn’t screwed on all the way. There is a gap under the heating plate. I know your not supposed to wash this but if somehow you got liquid inside that gap I’m sure it will stop working because its were all the wires are located. As for the crepes they come out really good. The instructions say there’s no need to flip them but that’s BS. The other side doesn’t fully cook and if you leave it on one side for to long there will be a burnt ring towards the middle. Not cute when your making a rainbow or colored crepe. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: VANESSA G.

customer_reviews.title: Cook like a pro
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make manicotti crepes and used to have the corded version. This is much nicer and cooks everything so evenly. Looks professionally made.
customer_reviews.author: TDNP

customer_reviews.title: May not be for keto recipes, but great little machine
customer_reviews.text: Great little product, would be wonderful for thin batter traditional crepes. Still looking for a keto recipe that will work with this (nut flour based batters are far too thick/ heavy for this method), but the experimentation is half the fun! Great for making uniformly sized crepes if that is important to you.
customer_reviews.author: Corie Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: No more cold crepes!
customer_reviews.text: We used to make crepes in the kitchen, which meant that they were mostly cold by the time we used up the batter. With this, you kind of integrate crepe making with eating, which is even quite fun! My only complaint is that the cable is really short. Otherwise, great product!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Magnifique traveling crepes
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little machine that makes crepe making possible anywhere there is an outlet. I am a French teacher, and needed it for crepe making in our library. Worked like a charm and stood up to use by 150 middle school kids in one day. Excellent Tool!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with open box
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived as an open box as you can see in the picture. It also looks like it has been used previously as seen in the second picture so I am not very impressed. Still deciding if I want to return or keep
customer_reviews.author: tanya

customer_reviews.title: Wife likes it
customer_reviews.text: The wife likes it. The first crepe came out a little rough but after that they were great. The only down side is you can use the last little but of patter because you can't poor it over the maker.
customer_reviews.author: david halverson

customer_reviews.title: It makes crepe making easy.
customer_reviews.text: The cooking plate doesn’t sit evenly on the element which opens a small area that crepe mixture can enter. I will have to be especially careful not to let this happen. No kids will use it.
customer_reviews.author: Simi Senior

customer_reviews.title: Great little kitchen gadget.
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn’t buy this because of a few of the negative reviews but I’m so glad I did. I’m not really sure how those reviews even came about because this handy little machine is fool-proof. Love it. Makes yummy crepes. Easily. Which is key to me. I love crepes but hate making them. Not anymore!
customer_reviews.author: dana

customer_reviews.title: _The_ way to make crepes.
customer_reviews.text: I have always made crepes in a regular pan, which is fine (probably better with a real crepe pan), but this CucinaPro makes the whole thing easier. Before you know it you will have a massive stack of crepes ready to go - unlike making pancakes, there seems to be no waiting for one to get cooked, they go so fast.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Get this one
customer_reviews.text: I saw a demo of this crepe maker on Instagram. I ordered one right away. This is a great crepe maker! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to make crepes
customer_reviews.text: Communication with seller is great, the product itself is ok you dont get professional made crepes but is close enough.
customer_reviews.author: Yeison E Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: They do not lie when they say paper thin crepes. I purchased it for my French Club and I am a bit disappointed. It works well and it is cordless and non-stick but there is no green button to show when crepes are ready and they are way too thin. I am from Belgium and I have eaten crepes since I as a child. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: I had to return it back to amazon 2 times ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it back to amazon 2 times because the pan would come in scratched on the black surface. So the crapes would stick to the starched surface, and would mess up the crape
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Crepe the easy way
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and easy to use. No need to spread or flip ... this does all the work. It took me a few tries to master but became easy after say the 4th one LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this crepe maker! Our family has made crepes for years and it was always such a hassle trying to get thin crepes in a pan on the stove. This makes it so much easier to make them. It’s dummy proof.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn Gines

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I only write comments if something is really good or really bad! The only bad side is that I want them BIGGER!!! CucunaPro, make this dives in XL size!
customer_reviews.author: maja

customer_reviews.title: Perfect crepes!
customer_reviews.text: So easy! I used the recipe in the book but replaced the flour with gluten free. Perfect crepes! The cordless feature makes this easy to dip without dragging the cord through the batter.
customer_reviews.author: arlene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little crepe maker, especially good for those early mornings. Works as advertised, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: J.T. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Its all a guess
customer_reviews.text: Wife wanted this for Christmas and I guess she wanted to serve me papers for the big d and I don't mean Dallas. (Country song from the 90's) I hope it works well. It looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Millard

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic replacement!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think this crepe maker would compare to my Nordic ware that I had for 20+ years....but, it makes perfect crepes for my homemade manicotti!!! It's so easy to use, especially without a cord, another pleasant surprise! Thanks for this wonderful gadget, I just love it and highly recommend it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to make crepes for a Girl Scout event. Easy to use and they were a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: So happy with my Crepe Maker
customer_reviews.text: I've used my crepe maker for a while now and I love it, it's super easy to use, the recipe for traditional crepes is great, easy clean up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: If you love crepes...
customer_reviews.text: Fun to use. We love it. We enjoy crepes and we can have them more often. It includes a few recipes but you can also find them on line.
customer_reviews.author: Ann G.

customer_reviews.title: Love crepes!
customer_reviews.text: I love this crepe maker. It is easy to use and the crepes come out perfect every time!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Worked once then stopped at all
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the crepe maker at the end of January 2018 and received the item on the Feb 9. My first attempt using this product was successfull. However, the pan didn’t heat at all when I tried to make similar dough a week later. I did make several attempts afterwards to see if it worked but to no avail. I wonder if I can return it or receive replacement
customer_reviews.author: Indah Wahyuni

customer_reviews.title: 110V instead 220V
customer_reviews.text: The nominal voltage 110V instead 220V. It's not specified into the Amazon description.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Zastenker

customer_reviews.title: Just used it and love it!
customer_reviews.text: I used this using a prepared mix purchased at World Market, which you add most everything. Anyway, it was a snap. Dipped it in the batter after reheating. Cooked until light was off for a few seconds. Started the edge of the crepe with the spatula then turned it upside down over a plate and it fell off. Easy as pie. The pan stayed hot enough that I could re-dip immediately. All were perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: D. H-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter because she loves crepes and it seemed so easy to use - she made crepes today and LOVES it! Quick and easy, and she said the basic recipe the product suggested was delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Does not Brown the crepe
customer_reviews.text: Very sorry i have to return this appliance. We used it once, and it makes nice crepes but does not get hot enough to put even a slight brown tinge on the crepe. The crepe ends up being batter-white, and is not attractive. Other than that, it is a very nice item that does make crepes, easy clean-up, compact design. If you don't need light-brown crepes, It's great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Comeaux

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart in the box.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't even had a chance to turn it on. Came in defective. Quality feels like cheap China crap.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: It's a game changer
customer_reviews.text: This crepe maker is a real game changer. It's easy to use and the crepes are delicious. Going cordless have me freedom when dipping into the batter. No more standing over a stove and frying pan adjusting the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C

customer_reviews.title: Great & Easy to use!  Perfect Crepes every time!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Its a little smaller then expected but its great! It does a good job. If you want both sides browned, you should buy a crepe maker that you can flip the crepe. The CucinaPro cordless is super easy to use and clean. It's fast and makes perfect crepes for me and my guests love the savory and dessert crepes that I make. Yum!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Works but very very slow. About 5 min + ...
customer_reviews.text: Works but very very slow. About 5 min + per crepes. Only if you don’t intend to make a lot.
customer_reviews.author: S.G.

customer_reviews.title: Please let me know how to return to change
customer_reviews.text: I would like to return and change come a scrash and open from the side please let me know if I can return to change
customer_reviews.author: teofilo

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very happy with this. We had been looking for one with the bowl to dip the crepe maker into for years now. I had one long ago and it makes crepe making easier.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Trask

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic ! ! !
customer_reviews.text: This is the neatest crepe maker. I've used a crepe pan, a plain old frying pan, and most every thing else - but this really makes it easy and makes them great! Took a couple for me to get the hang of it, but then it was nothing to it. Cleans up ever so well. I highly recommend this maker.
customer_reviews.author: Jean C. Staib

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This crepe maker worked like a charm. Love the cordless feature
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product Solid Would definitely buy from this company again Love the look Price is reasonable Service is good
customer_reviews.author: June Stolp

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Crepe maker
customer_reviews.text: This is really good crepe maker. I love it. Easy to use, easy to clean. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Galina R

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It works ok, but it seems to cook on the hotter side, making my crepes overdone every time. My friend has a very similar crepe maker, different brand, and hers worked much better. You are supposed to be able to turn the crepe maker over and have the crepe fall onto your plate, but that does not happen. If you waited that long, the crepes would be burned.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to use, good recipe, easy to clean, Grandkids love making crepes. We use on our camping trips. Chicken rollups, breakfast fruit rollups, casseroles. Can fill the crepe with ANYTHING you want to eat. On diets, the crepe is much less fattening than breads but you get the feel of having something substantial. I make them ahead and stuff or just dip them in honey. Would recommend this item for all types of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Vann

customer_reviews.title: Good for occasional home use.
customer_reviews.text: The crepe maker works great. It is really simple and mostly made of plastic, beside the crepe plate itself. If you are looking for something a little more sturdy I would look elsewhere, but for occasional home use it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great gift to give.
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy it was to use. However, disliked how little time it allowed to remove crepe and to sumerge into batter for another crepe. You have to watch it more than following the red light.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Atondo

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: So much fun. But sometimes it Cooks it while your dipping the batter. Leaves a mess.
customer_reviews.author: shawna labolle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!  Perfect crepes!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had not waited so long to order this. It has been the most fun to use. Perfect crepes every single time. I will be ordering one for my nephew as a birthday present since he loves mine so much. Great for children and beginner cooks.
customer_reviews.author: Thad S. Locklair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great machine, and makes the crepes faster than my old one. They never stick
customer_reviews.author: lesleo

customer_reviews.title: ... one didn't work but the return was efficient and easy and the replacement works
customer_reviews.text: First one didn't work but the return was efficient and easy and the replacement works. Just a bit hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: ATLL

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!! Follow all directions, an you will have no problems!!!! You sometimes have to help the Crepe off, but it's not a problem by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Nace

customer_reviews.title: very disappointing - product simply did not work when we ...
customer_reviews.text: very disappointing - product simply did not work when we plugged it in. and it was a gift, so particularly frustrating. Geez i at least expected it to function..... :(
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: This product does not work. It is supposed to ...
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. It is supposed to cook a thin crepe within seconds, instead I have left it through 2 cycles, 3-4 minutes and still not cooked. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Louw

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite appliance
customer_reviews.text: There is not an easier way on earth to cook delicious crepes. I used the recipe in the book. It took 3-4 crepes to get ahold of the dipping technique, but then I've done it perfect ever since.
customer_reviews.author: FarmerJ

customer_reviews.title: Endless fun endless variety
customer_reviews.text: The crepe maker is so convenient that I am constantly doing experiments. My favorite has been hotdogs in crepes.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Schaffner

customer_reviews.title: Simple, efficient, and tasty.
customer_reviews.text: It worked quite well actually. After a couple attempts we got the routine down well enough to make a good dozen rappers for my wife to make "Fresh Lumpia". I did not realize that you had to dip the unit upside down into the batter so I was a little bumb fuddled at first but hey, it worked great. The wrappers just fell off onto the plate when they were done. And there was no muss, no fuss. Am I glad I ordered this product. Yes, and I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Reese Grady

customer_reviews.title: ... gift for my wife and we were both very disappointed with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a gift for my wife and we were both very disappointed with it. It would take more than 20 minutes to fully cook just one crepe. I wish I could get my money back, but we did not open and use it within a month of the return date
customer_reviews.author: Buyer 1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great...even used they took well care of it!! Brings back family memories : )
customer_reviews.author: Tree

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for HS students to safely use.
customer_reviews.text: I have students use this for our crepe making. Super simple, and more than adequate. They are not Crepes Bretonnes, but the spirit is there in a highly portable and school safe way. The cords aren't that long, so you might consider an extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: KG francophile

customer_reviews.title: very cool crepe maker.
customer_reviews.text: works exactly as advertised. no issues with the dip pan as some users complain about... wireless is awesome as there are no cords getting in the way. I would recomend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Works just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This works great with the recipe in the book. We make up a big batch and eat about 1/4 of them the first meal, then put them in a fridge and eat them over the next couple days, some with syrup for breakfast, too. Works just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Ballinger

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting inside
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t clean inside/underneath. This part time when we went to use it, there was some sort of worms that got inside and we had to throw this away 🤢
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift for a creative pastry chef
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this thing more than any other appliance
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Muradyan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: you will love it if you love crapes. almost see through thin.
customer_reviews.author: Saved by Grace

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Crepe Maker!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Makes crepes super easy and works fantastic! Clean up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: barbanne54
customer_reviews.text: I have an older CucinaPro and loved it so decided to one for a gift. We tried this one out and it works as well as the old one which isn't cordless. It makes great crepes if you like the thin type and want to produce a lot in a short amount of time. It usually seems to take the first 3-4 crepes to kind of get going but then it works beautifully. It also comes with a dipping pan which is nice, as you want a shallow pan, so you can easily dip the crepe maker in your batter.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Herscher

customer_reviews.title: I just love my new crepe maker and it has great recipes ...
customer_reviews.text: I just love my new crepe maker and it has great recipes and its easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy, I feel like a chef
customer_reviews.text: We have had a blast with this since getting it for Christmas! The basic recipe is easy and makes a nice big batch of creeps. A little messy, but I think that will go away once we have a little more practice.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very easy to use. It’s takes a few times to figure it out but it works awesome when you do.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Easy to clean. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy V.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. My last Crepe Maker was corded and I loved it. It died after about 25 to 30 years. This cordless crepe maker is easier to use and makes perfect thin crepes.

customer_reviews.title: Crepes are a little thinner that I like but the ease of using this pan makes up ...
customer_reviews.text: This was everything I hoped it would be. Crepes are a little thinner that I like but the ease of using this pan makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: RIdaho

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I had no problem making perfect crepes with this product. It is fun and easy to use. The product arrived in perfect condition, I have used it a couple months (4-5 times) and no propblems.

customer_reviews.title: She loves making crepe and these were perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! She loves making crepe and these were perfect.

customer_reviews.text: It's Ok. It's light weight, but it works. The plastic accessories are very cheap looking.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift to a student that was going off to college. Very portable when the crepe craving will hit in the dorm.

customer_reviews.title: Can hardly wait to use this to make a desert ...
customer_reviews.text: Can hardly wait to use this to make a desert that I could never get right as I just could never get the crepe thin enough. Looking forward to using it!
customer_reviews.author: Copperpenny

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE I HAVE MADE THIS YEAR!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this last week. Oh my, I am so glad I did. Now making crepes for my students is so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: Made it easy for one squeamish with the frying pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan is great. The idea to provide something so practical - the low profile plate for dipping - usually doesn't make it to the product development table...Tried with a gluten free (xanthan gum free) recipe, and the boys all loved it. Nice alternative to gluten free bread once in a while, one can make a wrap instead of a two-piece sandwich...Firstly, on the basis of the desire for variety, and also because although many ready-made gf products out there are getting much better, the cost is really high for these products, including a loaf of bread.
customer_reviews.author: once in a blue moon

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Making crepes was on my 11 year old granddaughter's as well as my own summer bucket list. After just making 2 or 3 crepes we had the hang of it. We are having fun with it. We bought fresh raspberries at farmer's market and made our own topping. We are very impressed with ourselves. Easy to use and easy to clean. Also fast; we used recipe that came with it and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Page

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Delicious Crepes
customer_reviews.text: The crepemaker is very easy to use and makes perfect, thin crepes. The cordless design is pretty neat. It makes it easy to maneuver the skillet part without a cord getting in the way. The indicator light which is supposed to tell you when the crepe is done is not very reliable, but it's more of a gratuitous thing anyway and it is easy to tell when the crepes are ready. All in all I would definitely recommend this to anyone wanting crepes without the hassle of trying to cook them on a pan or griddle.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: Works! I can make thin consistent crepes for the first time ever.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use...enjoy using it...however, I did look at other creep recipies
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works fine but I can do just as well with my 7" non-stick pan.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: As cordless it is convenient. As a replacement for the original Maxim brand, disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Goran

customer_reviews.title: Make a crepe!
customer_reviews.text: I took two tires and then every crepe was perfect! The pan cleans easy and the booklet included a great basic crepe batter.
customer_reviews.author: paintres

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, but some time you have to move the pan to be able to make contact with the base. Nice for the desserts!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Rodriguez Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Makes great crepes. Comes with a recipe book. A bit messy till you get the hang of it. But worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless crepe maker!
customer_reviews.text: This cordless crepe maker works very well. It heats up quickly and is easy to use and super easy to clean. My first attempt failed because the crepe batter was too thick. Once I had the right consistency for the batter the batter stuck instantly, cooked quickly, and made crepe making really simple.
customer_reviews.author: Bryn Lynch

product_meta.title: CucinaPro Cordless Crepe Maker (1447) - FREE Recipe Guide, Non-Stick Dipping Plate plus Electric Base and Spatula
product_meta.description: CucinaPro Cordless Crepe Maker with Recipe Guide: Make delicious, paper thin crepes in minutes with the Cordless Crepe Maker by CucinaPro. The non-stick surface makes clean-up and cooking easy! Includes spatula and recipe guide so you have all you need to get started!
feature_bullets: On/off switch has a ready light to indicate when the surface is hot enough to begin cooking.
Dipping plate and a batter spreader are included to help you create the thinnest crepes.
Electric base has a cord wrap for neat and easy storage
Instruction/recipe booklet included which takes the guesswork out of use and crepe preparation.
